00032         matrix4x4() {
00033                 _11 = _22 = _33 = _44 = unit;
00034                 _21 = _31 = _41 = _12 =
00035                         _32 = _42 = _13 = _23 =
00036                                 _43 = _14 = _24 = _34 = zero;
00037         }
00038

00040         matrix4x4(const float diag) {
00041                 _11 = _22 = _33 = _44 = diag;
00042                 _21 = _31 = _41 = _12 =
00043                         _32 = _42 = _13 = _23 =
00044                                 _43 = _14 = _24 = _34 = zero;
00045         }

00049                 mat_linear[0] = m[0];
00050                 mat_linear[1] = m[1];

00052                 mat_linear[3] = m[3];
00053                 mat_linear[4] = m[4];

00055                 mat_linear[6] = m[6];
00056                 mat_linear[7] = m[7];
00057                 mat_linear[8] = m[8];
00058                 mat_linear[9] = m[9];
00059                 mat_linear[10] = m[10];
00060                 mat_linear[11] = m[11];
00061                 mat_linear[12] = m[12];
00062                 mat_linear[13] = m[13];
00063                 mat_linear[14] = m[14];
00064                 mat_linear[15] = m[15];
00065         }

00112         {
